title: Remote Jailor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose another player to jail.
- Give your remote or move it to another player at night. If a player doesn't have your remote, you must give it out.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The player with your remote can send messages to your target, and your target can send messages to you. To your target, it appears like a normal Jailor.
- Your target will be unable to communicate in any private chats they may have for the night.
- While jailed, targets are roleblocked through immunities, gain Powerful defense, and all other abilities used against them will fail. Indirect effects may still apply.
- The player with your remote may, in addition to their night action, execute your target, dealing an Unstoppable attack to them even if they lose the remote that night. If they execute a Town member this way, they may no longer execute, but others may. Only three players may be executed total.
